|overhead shot of Charnians in start positions|
Jadissan, the witch, has been defeated.
Yes, but so many have fallen in defense of Charnia.
|return|
It is done.  We couldn't have done it with out the help of you and your companions.
|return|
Quickly, we must attend to the wounded.
|return|
Boone gets very upset...they had no chance against Boone.
|return|
Again we have escaped death for one more day.
|return|
The evil witch is no more...Once again, Zorn's minions have failed to defeat Sildor and his friends.
|return|
That was all this evil witch could conjure up...It was almost too easy.
|return|
|S-Adwen|
Father, there are so many who have fallen.
Yes <FirstName>, and they shall not be forgotten.
I am so happy that you survived, father.
I too am so relieved that you made it, but there is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
I agree father...
Let's go...
<StartHighlight>THE END</Start>
<StartHighlight>This is the end of this adventure...You may watch the ending movie (available on The Vault) after exiting...please take some time to leave comments and feedback on The Vault</Start>
<StartHighlight>After this conversation ends, you may export your character if you wish or just exit the game...</Start>
<StartHighlight>Thanks again for playing...</Start>
